rule_description: Detect communication with known APT41 ShadowPad domains
rule_logic: http_request_host contains "amazonlivenews.com" OR http_request_host contains "googleaccount.org" OR http_request_host contains "topmicrosoft.com" OR http_request_host contains "kasperskyupdate.com" OR http_request_host contains "microsoftdesktop.com" OR http_request_host contains "youtubedownloading.com" OR http_request_host contains "paloaltonetworkhelp.com"
http_request_host contains "trycloudflare.com" OR http_request_host contains "msapp.workers.dev" OR http_request_host contains "infinityfreeapp.com" OR http_request_host contains "my5353.com"

rule_description: Detect communication with Russian APT41 infrastructure
rule_logic: (http_request_host contains ".ru") AND (http_request_host contains "kacer" OR http_request_host contains "kdes" OR http_request_host contains "kqvca" OR http_request_host contains "kvca" OR http_request_host contains "leadd" OR http_request_host contains "lrsm" OR http_request_host contains "rttkola" OR http_request_host contains "scdx" OR http_request_host contains "teon")

rule_description: Detect access to APT41 e-commerce impersonation domains
rule_logic: (http_request_host contains ".shop") AND (http_request_host contains "llbean" OR http_request_host contains "ariat")

rule_description: Detect communication with APT41 URL shortener services
rule_logic: http_request_host contains "tinyurl.com" OR http_request_host contains "lihi.cc" OR http_request_host contains "reurl.cc" OR http_request_host contains "my5353.com"

rule_description: Detect communication with GitHub impersonation domains
Detect communication with APT41 Ngrok tunnels
Detect APT41 SharePoint web shell files
rule_logic: TargetFilename endswith "CommandHandler.aspx" OR TargetFilename endswith "spinstall0.aspx" OR TargetFilename endswith "debug_dev.js"

rule_description: Detect APT41 TOUGHPROGRESS malware by hash
rule_logic: file_hash_md5 equals "79b949d4d1157becc6f3bde0860fc5e5" OR file_hash_md5 equals "adfbcbf70e91cdc7e647def8ecd5d786" OR file_hash_md5 equals "65da1a9026cf171a5a7779bc5ee45fb1" OR file_hash_md5 equals "d54187089a44e825d6a0e8e3793d5516" OR file_hash_md5 equals "43725d046e1e6db97a3e00fc465f532f" OR file_hash_md5 equals "4a06c0e6bc28b1b7e6b29a76664c413b"

rule_description: Detect APT41 GDrive Moonwalk malware by hash
rule_logic: file_hash_md5 equals "5b1e8455291d99a1724327b9a7fc2616" OR file_hash_md5 equals "b69984cbf52b418673bd08279ca845d6" OR file_hash_md5 equals "bfd6286bb39a0e24a2af28c63bd8e194" OR file_hash_md5 equals "75bfb7d5199bf0c4e62525099b33e14f" OR file_hash_md5 equals "f68ef9e40462c9760bf9c829edd9f4a9"

rule_description: Detect APT41 DodgeBox Dropper malware by hash
rule_logic: file_hash_md5 equals "393065ef9754e3f39b24b2d1051eab61" OR file_hash_md5 equals "b3067f382d70705d4c8f6977a7d7bee4" OR file_hash_md5 equals "0d068b6d0523f069d1ada59c12891c4a" OR file_hash_md5 equals "d72f202c1d684c9a19f075290a60920f" OR file_hash_md5 equals "bcac2cbda36019776d7861f12d9b59c4" OR file_hash_md5 equals "294cc02db5a122e3a1bc4f07997956da"

rule_description: Detect APT41 StealthVector malware by hash
rule_logic: file_hash_md5 equals "f062183da590aba5e911d2392bc29181" OR file_hash_md5 equals "4141c4b827ff67c180096ff5f2cc1474" OR file_hash_md5 equals "bc85062de0f70afd44bb072b0b71a8cc" OR file_hash_md5 equals "72070b165d1f11bd4d009a81bf28a3e5" OR file_hash_md5 equals "f0953ed4a679b987a2da955788737602"

rule_description: Detect APT41 ShadowPad malware by hash
rule_logic: file_hash_sha256 matches "92bb4ddb98eeaf11fc15bb32e71d0a63256a0ed826a03ba293ce3a8bf057a514" OR file_hash_md5 matches "ac125aea0b703de37980779599438b4a" OR file_hash_md5 matches "17d0ada8f5610ff29f2e8eaf0e3bb578"
process_name equals "wmic.exe" AND command_line contains "process call create" AND (command_line contains "Atexec" OR command_line contains "WmiExec")
process_name matches "rundll32.exe" AND command_line contains "agents.exe" OR process_name matches "rundll32.exe" AND command_line contains "agentx.exe"

rule_description: Detect APT41 HTA execution via mshta
rule_logic: process_name matches "mshta.exe" AND command_line contains "http" AND (command_line contains "tinyurl.com" OR command_line contains "lihi.cc" OR command_line contains "reurl.cc" OR command_line contains "my5353.com")
process_name matches "wmic.exe" AND command_line contains "os get locale" OR process_name matches "reg.exe" AND command_line contains "query" AND command_line contains "Control\\International"
protocol matches "SMB" AND (file_name matches "agents.exe" OR file_name matches "agentx.exe" OR file_name matches "CommandHandler.aspx" OR file_name matches "spinstall0.aspx")
